title: [安全|经济]HideOres —— 隐藏矿石并在你接近时给你一个惊喜![1.8.1,1.8.3]
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 11:06 编辑 

[fly]HideOres[/fly]
这是个什么插件？

这个插件可以使你在挖矿时看不见任何矿物，但当你靠近他们他们就会显现出来！怎么样，够不够惊(wu)喜(liao)

命令 无
权限 无

配置文件Config.yml
可以改变探测矿物的半径以及隐藏什么矿物和用什么方块去隐藏他们ores: #隐藏矿物
- 56
replacingBlocks: #替换方块
- 1
- 3
radius: 6   #改变半径
复制代码


Bug
当你靠近时，有一些块无法显示。（假如你装载了Lockette插件）

更新日志v0.1 = First betav0.2 = Changes in player move event processingv0.3 = Chest bug fixedv0.4 = Made some change to avoid lagging from playermoveeventv0.5 = Now using caching, so much less lag (hopefully)v0.6 = Fixed code that causing memory leakage (i'm watching in case if it happens again)v0.7 = Fixed memory leak problemv0.8 = No updates. just to make it compatible with 1.8.3. does not work with 1.8.1v0.9 = Found a serious problem and got fixed (this version works for both 1.8.1 and 1.8.3)
